summary: PhD Researcher in Human-Centered Computing passionate about leveraging LLMs and AI for enhanced human-data interaction. Expertise in narrative visualization, immersive analytics, and data storytelling, with a focus on developing AI-augmented frameworks that bridge human understanding with complex data systems. Skilled in Python, React, D3.js, and advanced NLP techniques, combining technical proficiency with a deep interest in human-AI collaborative systems.

highlights: Research focus: Narrative visualization frameworks, LLM text visualization, and human-centered data interfaces

education.degree: Master of Data Science (Awarded with Distinction)
highlights: Key courses: Business Intelligence Modelling, Data Exploration & Visualisation, Statistical Data Modelling, Big Data Processing, Data Wrangling, Applied Data Analysis, Data Warehousing

sections.title: Time-Track Narrative Graph Model
highlights: Developed TTNG to visualize narrative transitions in temporal data
Created a Graph-to-Text pipeline using LLMs to generate synthetic datasets
Conducted user studies to align algorithmic models with human narrative understanding
Applied NLP techniques: topic modeling, sentiment analysis, and text summarization

sections.title: Scrollytelling and Immersive Analytics
highlights: Researched scrollytelling methods to enhance user engagement with data narratives
Published findings on improving narrative coherence and interaction in visualization

projects.title: Causal Relationship Network Visualization
highlights: Built a React/TypeScript visualization tool for complex causal graphs
Implemented features for node categorization, centrality analysis, and advanced filtering

projects.title: Perspectiva - P-CLD Analysis Tool
highlights: Created a tool for documenting and visualizing Participatory Causal Loop Diagrams
Enhanced transparency in urban data governance decision-making processes

projects.title: Interactive Data Storytelling Case Study
highlights: Developed scrollytelling visualizations for COVID-19 trends and climate change impacts on disadvantaged communities
Built interactive narrative tools using D3.js and Python to enhance public understanding of complex social issues

interests: Music: Guitarist in a local band, participant in Melbourne Chinese Music Festival
Mentorship: Guiding students in data science and analytics projects
